title: Cyberlink PowerDVD ULTRA v8.0.1730 + KEYMAKER! [Multilingual]
description:
*************************************************************
Cyberlink PowerDVD ULTRA v8.0.1730 + KEYMAKER! [Multilingual]
*************************************************************
         
 


*******************  
..: DESCRiPTiON :..                             
*******************  
                                                                              
  
                                                                              
  
      CyberLink PowerDVD 8                                                    
  
      The No.1 Movie Experience on the PC now delivers                        
  
      New Dimensions in Movie Entertainment                                   
  
                                                                              
  
      PowerDVD 8 supports the best audio and video formats, to deliver        
  
      a true HD movie experience.                                             
  
                                                                              
  
      High Definition Playback                                                
  
                                                                              
  
      * Blu-ray Discs - Enjoy the best video quality and an enriched          
  
        movie experience with interactive features and next-gen movie         
  
        navigation. Display advanced content such as crew commentaries,       
  
        access online content and games, zoom in to details                   
  
      * High-Definition video formats - play MPEG-4 AVC (H.264), MPEG-2       
  
        HD, WMV-HD, and SMPTE VC-1 files.                                     
  
      * Optimized Output for widescreen displays - Get the most of your       
  
        movies with up to 1920 x 1080 image resolution.                       
  
      * CyberLink TrueTheater. Stretch technology - Display 16:9 and 4:3      
  
        videos on your monitor, regardless of its size.                       
  
      * CyberLink TrueTheater. Lighting technology -Enhance image details     
  
        and naturalize colors, with adaptive adjustments to chroma and        
  
        luminance. Select your preferred profile.                             
  
      * Hardware acceleration - Optimization for high-definition graphics     
  
        processors from Intel, NVIDIA and ATI ensure ultra-smooth             
  
       playback on the PC.                                                    
  
      * HDMI connectors - You can reduce the number of cables to only one     
  
        and still take full advantage of high-definition audio and video.     
  
                                                                              
  
      High-Definition and Home Theater Audio                                  
  
                                                                              
  
      PowerDVD delivers uncompressed HD audio and surround sound to make      
  
      the most of your home-cinema setup, bringing movies to life in your     
  
      living room.                                                            
  
                                                                              
  
      Supported Audio Formats                                                 
  
         Dolby TrueHD (7.1-channel)                                            
  
         Dolby Digital EX (7.1-channel)                                        
  
         Dolby Digital Plus (5.1-channel)                                      
  
         Dolby Meridian Lossless Packing (MLP)                                 
  
         DTS-HD (7.1-channel)                                                  
  
         DTS (5.1 channel)                                                     
  
         DTS 96/24 decoding                                                    
  
         DTS-ES (Discrete and Matrix)                                          
  
      Supported Audio Technologies                                            
  
         CyberLink TrueTheater. Surround                                       
  
         Dolby Pro Logic IIx surround sound                                    
  
         Dolby Virtual Speaker                                                 
  
         Dolby Headphone                                                       
  
         DTS Neo:6                                                             
  
                                                                              
  
      Smart DVD Utilities                                                     
  
                                                                              
  
      Notebook Maximizers Augment Battery Performance                         
  
                                                                              
  
      PowerDVD enhances the movie experience for notebook PCs:                
  
      * See-It-All delivers complete movie mxperience running on notebook     
  
        batteries -See-It-All ensures that a movie can be watched in full     
  
        by calculating a notebook&#039;s battery power versus the remaining        
  
        movie length and adjusting the movie playback speed accordingly.      
  
        PowerDVD&#039;s intelligent technology ensures the more you play, the      
  
        more accurate the estimate becomes.                                   
  
      * Built-in mobility features save battery power - PowerDVD&#039;s power-     
  
        saving mobility controls can extend movie viewing by up to 30%.       
  
                                                                              
  
      Read-It-Clearly Keeps the Movie Screen Clear of Text                    
  
                                                                              
  
      Read-It-Clearly lets you enjoy unobstructed viewing while watching      
  
      1 or 2 sets of language subtitles. Using a standard-sized monitor,      
  
      you can select to watch the subtitles of a 16:9 DVD within the          
  
      black bars on the bottom of your monitor.                               
  
                                                                              
  
      Say-It-Again. Never Miss a Word                                         
  
                                                                              
  
      Whether you missed that crucial Hollywood moment, your favorite         
  
      actor wasn&#039;t speaking clearly, or you are simply practicing your        
  
      listening skills in a foreign language, Say-It-Again automatically      
  
      repeats what was last said.with a simple click of a button.             
  
                                                                              
  
      www.cyberlink.com/english/products/powerdvd/8/hd_interactive.jsp 




******************************  
..: iNSTALL/REGiSTER NOTES :..
